name: Wyrmweaver
description:
A submission for Ludum Dare 51

A twinstick shooter where the enemies are spawned in 10 second increments, but so are your attacks!

Credit to Dan Zadorozny for the Saint Martyr font https://www.iconian.com/

Controls:

- WASD: Movement

- Mouse: Aiming

- Mouse 1: Fire basic projectile

- Mouse 2: Fire beam projectile

- Space: Stomp attack

- Shift: Movement Boost

- Escape/P: Pause
